paragraphs: As a highly analytical team player with a passion for frontend development and a background in Forestry, I possess strong skills in data analysis, project management, and GIS.
I have a strong foundation in web development, including experience with React, and I am eager to contribute to innovative projects.
I thrive in challenging environments, effectively collaborating within teams while maintaining independent productivity.
I am a quick learner eager to contribute to innovative projects, leveraging my analytical and technical skills to drive successful outcomes.

heading: Project Management
Geographic Information Systems (GIS)
UX Design Systems
Data Analysis and Visualization
paragraphs: Leading UX teams and managing design deliverables across complex projects, ensuring alignment with project goals and timelines.
I specialize in conducting thorough user research, including stakeholder interviews, user observations, and usability testing, to deeply understand user needs and pain points.
I am proficient in developing and maintaining design systems, ensuring consistency and efficiency across product teams.
I excel in leveraging data-driven approaches to create actionable insights and improve decision-making processes.
